title: Uses shall be as defined in clause (31) of Regulation No
clause_text: Uses shall be as defined in clause (31) of Regulation No.2, provided further that restaurant/eating house shall not be permissible in a residential building. Additional uses may include:
section: Additional facilities in the Development in Large Holding/layout
